long_description: Keep your hands free while hiking or traveling with the ChicoBag Water Bottle Sling. Sling is made of lightweight, durable recycled polyester; strap is made from recycled polypropylene. Sling includes large front pocket for your phone or wallet; other side features a lip-balm-sized pocket. The ChicoBag WaterBottle Sling is sized to fit most bottles, including Nalgene and Klean Kanteen products. Sling packs into its front pocket for easy storage.
short_description: Keep your hands free while hiking or traveling with the ChicoBag Water Bottle Sling.
